channel.title: sysadmin on [::1] yearl.us
channel.description: Recent content in sysadmin on [::1] yearl.us

item.title: Fsked El Capitan home directory
item.description: Not entirely sure how I managed to hose my user directory, but I did, and it followed a boot into safe mode (reboot and SHIFT) in order to update an ancient MacPorts installation; homebrew sort of replaced that for my usage. OK, no biggie. I have back ups right? I do, but those back up in recent months have been based on Apple’s Time Machine. I changed to this from Carbon Copy Cloner by means of experiment.

item.title: NPM, antigen and ZSH pure prompt
item.description: So somehow I managed to mess up my install of the pure prompt such that it was not loading async. prompt_pure_setup:10: async: function definition file not found prompt_pure_async_tasks:3: command not found: async_start_worker prompt_pure_async_tasks:4: command not found: async_register_callback How or why this happened I know not. Easy peasy to fix with npm, right? `‚ùØ npm update && npm install –global pure-prompt pure-prompt@1.1.0 postinstall /Users/yearlus/node_modules/pure-prompt dest=/usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions/; mkdir -p $dest && ln -sf “$PWD/pure.
